text: Clément Léon Émile Thomas was Governor General for various colonies in the Second French Colonial Empire, notably that of Senegal from 1888 to 1890 and French India from 1891 to 1896. In 1893 Clément-Thomas was made an honorary Knight Commander of the Indian Empire by the Government of British India. ==Titles Held== ==References== Category:French generals Category:Governors of French India Category:People of French West Africa Category:Colonial Governors of French Sénégal Category:Colonial Governors of French Madagascar Category:People of the French Third Republic Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:French colonial governors and administrators
title: Léon Émile Clément-Thomas
